summary: Completed comprehensive testing of French Wii U hacking guide with focus on StepPreparation modifications. Successfully verified SDLayout component removal, installation instructions implementation, and all navigation flows.
passed_tests: Backend /api/health endpoint returns ok status
Backend /api/guide/consoles endpoint returns console data with Wii U and 3DS
Homepage loads correctly with hero section and French title text
Console selector displays Wii U card as clickable and 3DS card as disabled
Navigation from homepage to /guide/wiiu works by clicking Wii U card
Step indicator shows 3 steps: Informations, Outils nécessaires, Préparation SD
Step Info page (/guide/wiiu/info) loads with 4 warning cards and Aroma features section
Step Tools page (/guide/wiiu/outils) loads with 4 tool cards and requirements checklist
Step Preparation page (/guide/wiiu/preparation) loads with all 4 numbered sections
Download buttons on preparation page correctly link to https://aroma.foryour.cafe/
Installation instructions section (section 4) shows 3 step-by-step installation steps
FAT32 warning box is visible in installation section
Mac tip collapsible section works (click to expand/collapse)
CRITICAL: SD Card Layout section (SDLayout/FolderTree) is completely REMOVED
Overwrite tip and PayloadLoader ready info boxes are visible
Navigation buttons work correctly between all steps (Précédent/Étape suivante)
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
French language implementation throughout all pages
Glassmorphism design and styling applied correctly
All 4 sections in preparation page: Base, Aroma, Plugins additionnels, Installation sur la carte SD

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (20/20 UI tests passed, all critical requirements met)
